The International School of Moscow Part of The British Schools Group
Dear {!Contact.Salutation} {!Contact.LastName},
Now that we have confirmed numbers for our residential trip to Oman, we are in the process of booking flights. In order to book the flights we require a copy of the information page of each students' passport. If you could please supply this either in digital or paper format by this Friday it would greatly speed up the process.
Please send digital copies to michelle.heckford@internationalschool.ru
Thank you for your support with this.
Best regards
Michelle Hamilton
The International School of Moscow World Class Education
